thread.title: Why Nathan Chen Studies LeBron James and Stephen Curry

author: Ben Cohen
title: Why Nathan Chen Studies LeBron James and Stephen Curry
text:
OAKLAND, Calif.â€”The day after the greatest American figure skater of his generation clinched his spot at the Olympics last month, Nathan Chen allowed himself one night with the most extravagant indulgence he could imagine. He went to an NBA game.
It was a peculiar time in his life. Chen was almost famous. By the end of this week, he could be the next Olympic star, a prodigy whose athleticism has revolutionized his sport.
